Posts.Content: try a pregnancy test.  If it's positive, it might be cancer.  I read that in tanya harding's book outsmart your cancer.  i don't know if that's accurate.  if it's positive and she's not pregnant, there might be something going on.  Let us know the results.  will pray for you and your family.
Posts.Title: Scared for my Wife

Posts.Content: I think your girlfriend can be dehydrated which can cause her to be disillusional.  She needs to be admitted to the er so they can do some tests.  That is what happened to my mom one month ago and today she has passed away.  My mom was getting disillusional because of the blockage.
Posts.Title: please help i dont know what is wrong
